segments.text: I'm staring at this kitchen, and I can barely believe my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is literally pouring water onto the floor, a continuous stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so completely unaware of their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, her foot in the growing puddle!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just drying a plate, as if nothing out of the ordinary is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's mind-boggling, almost infuriatingly detached from reality.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And behind her, the children are up to no good, risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a tilting stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she sense the quiet mischief or the imminent danger?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serene garden outside only makes her lack of attention more striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a recipe for disaster, and she's just polishing silverware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of obliviousness is truly astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to snap her out of this trance immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR
